name: 1.5.5: Scanlan Shorthalt
body:
## What's Changed * Fix a crash when a comic does not have a url by @mizaki in #393 * Update macOS packaging, .zip, .cbz, .rar, .cbr, .7z, .cb7 files should all allow opening in ComicTagger from Finder * 7zip support is now optional if installing via pip * The standard notes value is now appended to instead of overwriting existing data fixes #390 *
Update checking now works, disabled by default.
# Settings will be changed in the _next_ release Currently the format used to store and retrieve settings has some downsides, primarily the format is not well defined and does not allow for more complex types. Consequently there is now a warning that you must silence 4 times if you want it to go away. Because a new format is being used the settings will not be deleted so you can open up an old version and the new version at the same time in order to compare. **Full Changelog**: https://github.com/comictagger/comictagger/compare/1.5.4...1.5.5

name: 1.5.4: Asta

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/comictagger/comictagger/compare/1.5.3...1.5.4

name: 1.5.3: Walter Kovacs
body:
## What's Changed
* Fix an issue with retrieving alternate cover images
   * Currently there is still an issue when using using the search button, however the auto-identify and auto-tag features will work.
* Uses latest PyInstaller to build packages, fixes a sorting issue on macOS

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/comictagger/comictagger/compare/1.5.2...1.5.3

name: 1.5.1: Trafalgar D. Water Law
body:
## What's Changed
* Fix CBL tagging fixes #376
* Update the importlib_metadata minimum version fixes #375
* Fix an issue when replacing invalid characters during renaming
* Fixes a crash that could occur during renaming fixes #374
* Add an additional syntax to file renaming

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/comictagger/comictagger/compare/1.5.0...1.5.1

name: 1.5.0: Douglas Aaron Ramsey
body:
## What's Changed
* Better sorting using natsort os_sorted with pyicu by @lordwelch in [369] fixes #368 

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/comictagger/comictagger/compare/1.4.8...1.5.0

[369]: https://github.com/comictagger/comictagger/pull/369

## What's Changed
* Fix several issues with renaming #357, #359, #360, #361

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/comictagger/comictagger/compare/1.4.6...1.4.7

## What's Changed
* Fix an issue with using format specifiers in the rename template fixes #356
* Adds the Chocolatey package as a way to install ComicTagger by @Xav83 in https://github.com/comictagger/comictagger/pull/355

## New Contributors
* @Xav83 made their first contribution in https://github.com/comictagger/comictagger/pull/355

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/comictagger/comictagger/compare/1.4.6...1.4.7

## What's Changed
* <details><summary>Fix #353</summary>

  The two primary cases fixed are:
  Ms. Marvel
  spider-man/deadpool

  The first issue removed 'Ms.' which is a problem as many comics have
  series that the only difference in the title is the
  designation/honorific.

  The second issue is that the '/' was removed and not replaced with
  anything causing a search for 'mandeadpool' which will not show useful
  results.

  Consequently all designations/honorifics are now untouched
  All punctuation is replaced with a space
</details>

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/comictagger/comictagger/compare/1.4.5...1.4.6

## What's Changed
* Fix retrieving alt-covers fixes #350
* Update minimum version of Pillow fixes #350

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/comictagger/comictagger/compare/1.4.4...1.4.5

## What's Changed
### Features
* Add CommunityRating. by @MichaelFitzurka in https://github.com/comictagger/comictagger/pull/277
* Add new filename parser by @lordwelch in https://github.com/comictagger/comictagger/pull/288
* Add publisher and imprint handling by @lordwelch in https://github.com/comictagger/comictagger/pull/133
* Word split partially fixes #176 by @lordwelch in https://github.com/comictagger/comictagger/pull/193
* Add a literal search option by @lordwelch in https://github.com/comictagger/comictagger/pull/311
* Remove empty tags versus clearing. by @MichaelFitzurka in https://github.com/comictagger/comictagger/pull/279
* Add an updating log window to show the current log file @lordwelch
* Update the default rename template to the proper syntax @lordwelch
* Allow non-ascii in ComicVine searches by @lordwelch in https://github.com/comictagger/comictagger/pull/321
* Allow changing the ComicVine url fixes #104
* Allow multiple types to be specified using -t fixes #24
* Add a message if a CBR/RAR file is opened and the rar application is not available fixes #92 and #38
* Improve volume handling by @lordwelch in https://github.com/comictagger/comictagger/pull/303

### Bugfixes
* Update filerenamer by @lordwelch in https://github.com/comictagger/comictagger/pull/285
* ComicTagger now accounts for any single unicode numeric value in issue strings (e.g. ¼) fixes #291
* Ensure that comics are properly removed when using remove_archive_list fixes #287 by @lordwelch in https://github.com/comictagger/comictagger/pull/292
* Allow overwriting existing metadata fixes #224 by @lordwelch in https://github.com/comictagger/comictagger/pull/294
* Fixing double page always flagging as modified by @MichaelFitzurka in https://github.com/comictagger/comictagger/pull/302
* Fix a crash when saving tags with duplicate credits and give better errors when renaming fails (#342)
* Fix an issue when renaming files and metadata fields are empty #322

### Code updates
* Update build settings by @lordwelch in https://github.com/comictagger/comictagger/pull/284
* Remove old file renamer by @lordwelch in https://github.com/comictagger/comictagger/pull/280
* Remove utils.indent, python 3.9 provides a similar function by @lordwelch in https://github.com/comictagger/comictagger/pull/286
* Cleanup ui files by @lordwelch in https://github.com/comictagger/comictagger/pull/289
* Use argparse for CLI flags by @lordwelch in https://github.com/comictagger/comictagger/pull/306
* Update GitHub Actions by @lordwelch in https://github.com/comictagger/comictagger/pull/312
* Generalise cache db by @mizaki in https://github.com/comictagger/comictagger/pull/323
* Ignore aspect ratio on background image by @MichaelFitzurka in https://github.com/comictagger/comictagger/pull/328
* More consistent joining of API URLs (should address #345)

## New Contributors
* @mizaki made their first contribution in https://github.com/comictagger/comictagger/pull/323

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/comictagger/comictagger/compare/1.4.3...1.4.4

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/comictagger/comictagger/compare/1.4.0...1.4.1

# This release has a bug preventing saving of tags: fixed in 1.4.2
## What's Changed
* Code cleanup by @lordwelch in https://github.com/comictagger/comictagger/pull/220
* Displaying invalid value with Error indicator by @MichaelFitzurka in https://github.com/comictagger/comictagger/pull/238
* Adding web link convenience button to open a valid url value in a browser window. by @MichaelFitzurka in https://github.com/comictagger/comictagger/pull/240
* Ensure that tags are overwritten when saving metadata Fixes https://github.com/comictagger/comictagger/issues/241
* method renamed to match new changes. by @MichaelFitzurka in https://github.com/comictagger/comictagger/pull/244
* Added bookmark functionality. by @MichaelFitzurka in https://github.com/comictagger/comictagger/pull/245
* Empty metadata should not assign an empty tag. by @MichaelFitzurka in https://github.com/comictagger/comictagger/pull/248
* Add basic logging by @lordwelch in https://github.com/comictagger/comictagger/pull/249
* Fix parsing of filenames that end with an ID such as [__######__] by @abuchanan920 in https://github.com/comictagger/comictagger/pull/250
* Double Page functionality. by @MichaelFitzurka in https://github.com/comictagger/comictagger/pull/251
* Fixing some HTML to comment translations. by @MichaelFitzurka in https://github.com/comictagger/comictagger/pull/252
* Menu command to clear out page size,height,width on demand… by @MichaelFitzurka in https://github.com/comictagger/comictagger/pull/254
* Adding "M" age rating for 2.0 schema by @MichaelFitzurka in https://github.com/comictagger/comictagger/pull/256
* Fix #242 by @lordwelch in https://github.com/comictagger/comictagger/pull/266
* Add test infrastructure by @davide-romanini in https://github.com/comictagger/comictagger/pull/166
* Keyboard commands for the Pages tab to make editing easier. by @MichaelFitzurka in https://github.com/comictagger/comictagger/pull/264
* Renaming by @lordwelch in https://github.com/comictagger/comictagger/pull/129
* Add the ability to specify a config directory by @lordwelch in https://github.com/comictagger/comictagger/pull/268
* Add more tests for parsing filenames by @lordwelch in https://github.com/comictagger/comictagger/pull/269
* Code cleanup by @lordwelch in https://github.com/comictagger/comictagger/pull/271


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/comictagger/comictagger/compare/1.3.1...1.4.0

name: 1.3.2-alpha.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Code cleanup by @lordwelch in https://github.com/comictagger/comictagger/pull/220
* Displaying invalid value with Error indicator by @MichaelFitzurka in https://github.com/comictagger/comictagger/pull/238
* Adding web link convenience button to open a valid url value in a browser window. by @MichaelFitzurka in https://github.com/comictagger/comictagger/pull/240
* Ensure that tags are overwritten when saving metadata Fixes #241


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/comictagger/comictagger/compare/1.3.1...1.3.2-alpha.0

## What's Changed
* Fix UTF-8 related crash by @lordwelch in https://github.com/comictagger/comictagger/pull/226 Fixes #236 #226 #229
* Update to look for images in data-src as well as src. by @MichaelFitzurka in https://github.com/comictagger/comictagger/pull/228
* Added 7zip support thru py7zr. by @MichaelFitzurka in https://github.com/comictagger/comictagger/pull/225
* Natsort fix by @rhaussmann in https://github.com/comictagger/comictagger/pull/237
* Explicitly specify unsigned integer sort to fix comic page order by @abuchanan920 in https://github.com/comictagger/comictagger/pull/221

## New Contributors
* @MichaelFitzurka made their first contribution in https://github.com/comictagger/comictagger/pull/228
* @rhaussmann made their first contribution in https://github.com/comictagger/comictagger/pull/237
* @abuchanan920 made their first contribution in https://github.com/comictagger/comictagger/pull/221

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/comictagger/comictagger/compare/1.3.0...1.3.1

name: 1.3.1-alpha.0 (2022-03-24)
body:
## What's Changed
* Fix UTF-8 related crash by @lordwelch in https://github.com/comictagger/comictagger/pull/226
* Update to look for images in data-src as well as src. by @MichaelFitzurka in https://github.com/comictagger/comictagger/pull/228

## New Contributors
* @MichaelFitzurka made their first contribution in https://github.com/comictagger/comictagger/pull/228

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/comictagger/comictagger/compare/1.3.0...1.3.1-alpha.0

## What's Changed
* Allow for macOS dark mode by @davide-romanini in #159
* Enable PyInstaller console flag by @davide-romanini in #158
* Use unrar-cffi instead of python-unrar by @davide-romanini in #151
* Better console handling on Windows by @davide-romanini in #162
* Increase comicvine search results by @davide-romanini in #164
* Fix errors #172 by @lordwelch in #192
* Series search by @lordwelch in #189
* Move to python requests module by @lordwelch in #134
* Cleanup metadata handling by @lordwelch in #188
* Update travis.yml by @lordwelch in #196
* Finish normalize series search (fixes automatic tagging with ':' vs '-') by @lordwelch in #199
* Update natsort usage to be compliant with the latest version fixes #203 by @lordwelch in #204
* Fix rarfile import as by default it is optional by @lordwelch in #206
* Fixed typo by @jpcranford in #207
* Allow extended selection in the page list editor by @lordwelch in #131
* Sort language correctly by @lordwelch in #132
* Series sorting filtering by @thFrgttn in #200
* Cleanup settings from #200 by @lordwelch in #213
* Update ComicInfo.xml instead of overwriting fixes #185 by @lordwelch in #202
* Bug fixes #65,#59,#154,#180,#187,#209 by @lordwelch #214
* Update README fixes #174 by @lordwelch in #204

## Build System
* PyPI release by @davide-romanini in #163
* Use GithubActions as primary release platform by @lordwelch in #201
* Add optional dependencies fixes #191 by @lordwelch in #204
* Set PyQt5 to 5.15.3, 5.15.4 has issues with pyinstaller by @lordwelch in #204
* Add pyproject.toml with setuptools, isort and black configuration by @lordwelch in #204

## New Contributors
* @lordwelch made their first contribution in #192
* @jpcranford made their first contribution in #207
* @thFrgttn made their first contribution in #200

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/comictagger/comictagger/compare/1.2.3...1.3.0

## 1.3.0-alpha.0 (2019-10-06)

### Change

* Better support for macOS dark mode (#159)
* Better support for CLI mode in Windows (#158, #162)
* Use new unrar-cffi library for rar reading (#151)
* Increase comicvine search results per request (should result in less Comic Vine hits) (#164)

### Other

* Automatic PyPI release (#163)

name: ComicTagger 1.2.2
body:
# 1.2.2
 * Fix: version not included in macOS info.plist (#146)

name: ComicTagger 1.2.1
body:
This is a minor release focusing on build automation:
 * now all releases are automatically built and uploaded from Travis CI
 * added a `MACOSX_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET=10.11` in the hope it improves compatibility

name: ComicTagger 1.2.0
body:
* same features as 1.1.32-rc1
 * automatic build and github release using travis (for macOS) and appveyor (for windows)
 * start to use git flow for release management

name: Fix TLS problems
body: Fixes #137.

name: ComicTagger 1.1.31-rc1 for Windows
body: Fixes  #117.

name: ComicTagger 1.1.30-rc1 for Windows
body: Upgrade to Pyqt5

name: 1.1.16-beta-rc2
body:
UPDATE: 2018-01-17
I've added a new Windows release (64bit). I think it's stable right now, but before finishing a new official release any feedback will be appreciated.


More fixes:
 - added pillow dependencies
 - fixed drag and drop problems
 - comicvine ssl issues should be mostly fixed now

This version works only on MacOS Sierra 64bit. 
According to this: https://pythonhosted.org/PyInstaller/usage.html#making-mac-os-x-apps-forward-compatible, supporting previous versions is a big effort, if you know easier solutions please tell.

name: 1.1.16-beta-rc
body: Fix for issue #87. This is only for MacOS Intel 64 bit. Let me know if it works as expected.

name: Release 1.1.15-beta (13-Jun-2014)
body: Migrated from google code project
